summary: This bill, the "Fair Accounting for Income Realized from Betting Earnings Taxation Act" (FAIR Bet Act), aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 regarding wagering losses. Specifically, it proposes to amend Section 165(d) by changing the percentage allowed for deducting gambling losses from 90% to 100%. This would allow individuals and businesses to deduct the full amount of their gambling losses against their gambling winnings for tax purposes.
